txt.en: The fourth page of the ledger talks about the sheep and their pen. Comparing it to the page before, you see that the sheep were shorn several months ago. Some new wool should have grown by now.
The ledger details out several items around the homestead and their values.
The sheep pen is in the central section of the homestead.\n\nThe fourth page of the ledger identifies where the sheep pen is. Their wool should be ready for an early sheering.
